snippet: The federal government is suing Southwest Airlines Co. after failing to reach a settlement with the carrier over allegations that repairs to dozens of planes didn't meet safety standards....

headline.print_headline: US Sues Southwest Airlines Over Maintenance Issues
headline.main: U.S. Sues Southwest Airlines Over Maintenance Issues

lead_paragraph: The federal government is suing Southwest Airlines Co. after failing to reach a settlement with the carrier over allegations that repairs to dozens of planes didn't meet safety standards.
